lists.rss: function(head, req) { var row; start({ "headers": { "Content-Type": "text/xml" } }); send('<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><rss version="2.0"><channel><title>ExtDoc Comments</title>'); while(row = getRow()) { send('<item><title>'+row.value.providerId+': '+row.value.element+'</title><description>'+row.value.text+'</description><author>'+row.value.username+'</author><pubDate>'+row.value.date+'</pubDate></item>'); } send('</channel></rss>'); }
lists.rssRatings: function(head, req) { var row; start({ "headers": { "Content-Type": "text/xml" } }); send('<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><rss version="2.0"><channel><title>ExtDoc Comments</title>'); while(row = getRow()) { send('<item><title>'+row.value.providerId+': '+row.value.element+'</title><description>'+row.value.rating+' Stars</description><pubDate>'+row.value.date+'</pubDate></item>'); } send('</channel></rss>'); }
